entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:12 a.m. PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
